text: jaan rakho ki vishuddh dharm allaah hee ke lie hai. rahe ve log jinhonne usase hatakar doosare samarthak aur sanrakshak bana rakhe hai (kahate hai,) "ham to unakee bandagee isee lie karate hai ki ve hamen allaah ka saameepy praapt kara den." nishchay hee allaah unake beech us baat ka faisala kar dega jisamen ve vibhed kar rahe hai. allaah use maarg nahin dikhaata jo jhootha aur bada akrtagy ho
